body: Hope she got married, to streets of course.

Intriguing. But she’s gonna get caught. Too obvious with all the kiss marks, suspicious behaviour, short skirts, and her friend knowing. Man, I do enjoy NTR, as well as NTR, but my favourite is when they get caught. The drama in that is great. Them being able to hide it and become happy to be cheating always feels like a cop out from the author. No real resolution.
I see the girlfriend looking her boyfriend to her friend in the future he he he
